content.text: Match ends, Newcastle United 0, Leicester City 3.
Second Half ends, Newcastle United 0, Leicester City 3.
Corner,  Leicester City. Conceded by Paul Dummett.
Attempt missed. Fabricio Coloccini (Newcastle United) right footed shot from the right side of the box is high and wide to the right following a set piece situation.
Foul by Nathan Dyer (Leicester City).
Papiss Demba Cissé (Newcastle United) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Substitution, Leicester City. Nathan Dyer replaces Riyad Mahrez.
Goal!  Newcastle United 0, Leicester City 3. Shinji Okazaki (Leicester City) right footed shot from very close range to the centre of the goal.
Attempt saved. Danny Simpson (Leicester City) right footed shot from a difficult angle on the right is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Marc Albrighton.
Substitution, Newcastle United. Siem de Jong replaces Ayoze Pérez.
